name: Lost & Wander
description:
Lost & Wander is a Single Player, Story Driven, 3d platformer game. In this game you play as Jon, who got lost in the forest  during an excursion with his friends. After getting lost when he tried to search for his friends, they were nowhere to be found and the place also seemed to be different than what it was before, So he thought of moving ahead following the trail, hoping that it would guide him back to his home.  

Help Jon reaching his destination.
